result.execSummary:
The defendant Roman Roque Ramos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash Bond Posted in the amount of $250.00 has been applied.  The remaining balance of the Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 2:42 PM: Defendant Roman Roque Ramos in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.   Interpreter oath given by the Court.  Def confirms resolution reached.  Terms of agreement recited by ADA.  Defendant understands terms of agreement.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Knowing and voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. 16CM-138 Plea OAR:  NC  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  16TR-858 DRI.   Statement by Def:  None offered.  The Court:  Court Costs imposed - bond to be applied - 60 DTP Bal plus DNA Sample and Surcharge ordered by the Court.  Defendant advised of right to expunge DNA record through the Department of Justice.  Hispanic Appeal Rights Given.

Pre-trial conference on May 26, 2016 at 09:45 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 7, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
No operation of any motor vehicles without a valid driver's license.

16CM-138 and 16TR-858 - Both Cases Called @ 2:54 PM: Defendant Roman Roque Ramos in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Oath administered at a previous hearing today.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Def is unsure on counsel issue - employed FT.  Upon discussions of earnings Court does not believe the Def will qualify for SPD services.  Def would like to speak with the State without counsel.  NGP entered.   PTC and P/S Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 26, 2016 at 09:45 am.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
